Package org.husky.emed.ch.cda.narrative.generators

Class PdfOriginalRepresentationGenerator

java.lang.Object
org.husky.emed.ch.cda.narrative.generators.AbstractNarrativeGenerator
org.husky.emed.ch.cda.narrative.generators.PdfOriginalRepresentationGenerator
public class PdfOriginalRepresentationGenerator extends AbstractNarrativeGenerator
This class provides a way to generate a CDA-CH-EMED PRE or PMLC document original representation as a PDF 1/A. The generated PDF contains the information of the CDA document rendered for human reading. The languages supported are English, German, French and Italian.

To include the PDF in the document, see NarrativeUtils.setPdfOriginalRepresentation(org.husky.common.hl7cdar2.POCDMT000040ClinicalDocument, byte[], org.husky.emed.ch.cda.narrative.enums.NarrativeLanguage)

HTML template file:

Internals: it first creates an HTML document with all the data and then converts it to a PDF.

Author:
Quentin Ligier
